title: Asian Chill Equipment wins Platinum at Industrial Excellence Awards 2022
body_lines: Asian Chill Equipment Pvt (Ltd) and the ASPARAI brand, a leader in manufacturing commercial stainless steel refrigeration and kitchen equipment, food display counters for hotels, won the platinum award in the small and medium scale electrical and electronic equipment manifesting category at the Industrial Excellence Awards organised by the Industrial Development Board (IDB). Managing Director of the Company, Vajira Kumara Silva received the award at the gala event held at the Waters Edge Hotel. The chief guest of the event was President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

Asian Chill Equipment Pvt (Ltd) was established in 1990. The company produces quality commercial refrigeration equipment and much sought-after kitchen equipment for hotels & food display counters that adheres to international standards. The products designed and manufactured by experienced engineers and well-trained technicians are also in demand in other countries including Dubai, Maldives, Australia, and Seychelles. The company received several quality and standards certificates that include ISO 9001: 2015, ISO 22000, HACCP, GMP, CE and Made in Sri Lanka.
